    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Ambulance
    A composition of an AreaOfEffect and an EmergencyCar.
    AreaOfEffect
    An extension the Circle Depicts the area in which an ambulance influences the behaviour of other vehicles.
    Behaviour
    The behaviour types for cars.
    Block
    An extension to Land.
    Car
    Is an extension to Vehicle Describes a car object on the GUI.
    Configuration
    Central configuration-class for the application.
    ControlsController
    The JavaFX controller for the right side control panel of the simulator.
    CsvExport
    Used by MainApp for exporting simulation analytical data to a Comma Separated Value (CSV) file.
    CustomPath
    An extension to the JavaFX Path class.
    Direction
    Movement directions for Vehicles and Lanes.
    Dirt
    An extension to Land.
    EditorApp
    EditorApp represents the map editor of the Simulus suite.
    EditorControlsController
    The JavaFX controller for the control panel of the map editor.
    EmergencyCar
    An extension to Car EmergencyCars have an AreaOfEffect associated with them.
    FileIO
    Used by MainApp to copy/delete the temporary CSV file created in CsvExport to a new location.
    Grass
    An extension to Land.
    Intersection
    Contains all tiles belonging to the intersection.
    IntersectionConfigDialog
    This is the configuration dialog for intersections.
    IntersectionDialogController
    The JavaFX controller for the right side control panel of the simulator.
    IntersectionTile
    An extension of Tile Allows storing of CustomPath and provides a reference to the intersection this tile belongs to.
    Land
    An extension to Tile.
    LandType
     
    Lane
    An extension to Tile.
    MainApp
     
    Map
    This class is the central management facility for a map's storage and management.
    MapValidator
    Validation class for validating Editor created Maps
    MapXML
    Used by the Simulus suite of applications, (MainApp) and the Editor (EditorApp), for import and export of a Simulus map file.
    Orientation
    The orientation of a road-tile.
    ResourceBuilder
    Provides a central access point to all resources used when rendering the simulation or the editor.
    Road
    Represents a roadblock.
    RootLayoutController
    The JavaFX controller for the root layout of the simulator.
    SimConfigXML
    Used by the Simulus suite of applications, (MainApp) for importing and exporting a Simulus simulation file which contains simulation parameters.
    SimulationController
    A controller managing the simulation.
    Startup
    The Startup class functions as a splash screen, providing users with the choice between the Simulator (MainApp) and the Editor (EditorApp).
    Tile
    The base class for all types of tiles.
    TileGroup
    Interface used in Road and Intersection.
    Truck
    An extension to Vehicle.
    TurningDirection
    The directions a car can turn to when following a CustomPath
    Vehicle
    The base class for all vehicles represented in the simulation.
    VehicleColorOption
    Enumeration used to determine the colour of vehicles.
    Water
    An extension to Land.
